availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hartwell B. Shuffett (Green County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Harrison County, Kentucky, native. Married to Malinda C. Russell Shuffett. Father of Mary A. Shuffett, Michael Shuffett, Catharine Shuffett, Grant T. Shuffett, Quintinilla Shuffett, James Shuffett, Larkin Shuffett, Thomas G. Shuffett, Asberry Shuffett, Malinda Shuffett, and Laura B. Shuffett. Farmer in Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 89B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 610.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Precinct 3, p. 481A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994036, Green County Births.
